name: Jumpyn
description:
This is Jumpyn. In this game you jump when you touch the ground, you can dash(with   the LeftShift  key) and you can move a barrel that makes you jump. You have a limited amount of jumps and lives. When you will have 0 lives you will play a little minigame. If you lose you will be sent back to the first level but if you win you will continue with your progress.

   Story:

 You are a little square that wants to join a magic school but when you fail you are sent back through time.
